title: REGION 3 NEWS RELEASE
content:
Ward 2 City Marshal’s Office Officer Involved Shooting
Marksville, LA- Last night, City Marshals from the Ward 2 office were involved in a shooting. The shooting occurred around 9:30 p.m., on Martin Luther King Drive in Marksville, LA.
The preliminary investigation has revealed that City Marshals from Ward 2 discharged their duty weapons, at a vehicle, at the conclusion of a pursuit. The driver of the fleeing vehicle is in critical condition and a six year old passenger has been pronounced dead.
The Louisiana State Police Bureau of Investigations/Alexandria Field Office responded to the scene at the request of the Marksville Police Department to investigate the incident/shooting.
The investigation remains ongoing.
